per_frame_1=wave_r = 0.45 + 0.45*sin((time+bass)*2.133);
per_frame_2=wave_g = 0.45 + 0.45*sin((time+bass)*2.333);
per_frame_3=wave_b = 0.45 + 0.45*sin((time+bass)*2.533);
per_frame_4=
per_frame_5=// Beat detection by martin!
per_frame_6=
per_frame_7=dec_med = pow (0.9, 30/fps);
per_frame_8=dec_slow = pow (0.99, 30/fps);
per_frame_9=beat = max (max (bass, mid), treb); 
per_frame_10=avg = avg*dec_slow + beat*(1-dec_slow);
per_frame_11=is_beat = above(beat, .5+avg+peak) * above (time, t0+.2);
per_frame_12=t0 = is_beat*time + (1-is_beat)*t0;
per_frame_13=peak = is_beat * beat + (1-is_beat)*peak*dec_med;
per_frame_14=
per_frame_15=x = if(is_beat,int(rand(60))*0.01 + 0.2,x);
per_frame_16=y = if(is_beat,int(rand(60))*0.01 + 0.2,y);
per_frame_17=z = if(is_beat,int(rand(2))-1,z);
per_frame_18=wave_mystery = if(above(x,y),0,-1);
per_frame_19=q31 = x;
per_frame_20=q32 = y;
per_frame_21=q30 = z;
warp_1=`sampler sampler_worms;
warp_2=`float3 color, mus;
warp_3=`float dx,dy;
warp_4=`shader_body {
warp_5=`
warp_6=`
warp_7=`float2 uv1 = (uv-.5) * aspect.xy;
warp_8=`
warp_9=`float2 uv6 = uv1;
warp_10=`float z = q31*length((abs(uv1.x)-abs(uv1.y)));
warp_11=`float2 d = normalize(uv1);
warp_12=`float2 rs = clamp(tan(z)*d,-2,2);
warp_13=`uv += .0*lum(GetBlur1(uv))*float2 (0,1);
warp_14=`uv -= rs/20;
warp_15=`
warp_16=`uv6 = .4*sin(uv*14+rand_frame);
warp_17=`mus = .01/(length(uv6));
warp_18=`mus *= .3*(1+roam_cos);
warp_19=`//mus = .2;
warp_20=`
warp_21=`float3 crisp= tex2D(sampler_main,(uv-.5)*(.95+.2*z)+.5);
warp_22=`
warp_23=`float3 ret1 = crisp + mus;
warp_24=`
warp_25=`q25 = 1;
warp_26=`ret = q25*(ret1*.99-.025) + (1-q25)* GetPixel(uv_orig);
warp_27=`
warp_28=`}
comp_1=`float3 ret1, neu;
comp_2=`
comp_3=`shader_body
comp_4=`{
comp_5=`float2 uv2;
comp_6=`float ang2, c, s;
comp_7=`uv -= 0.5;
comp_8=`uv *= aspect.xy;    
comp_9=`
comp_10=`float2 tmp = uv;
comp_11=`ret1 = 0;
comp_12=`int anz = 4;
comp_13=`int n = 0;
comp_14=`while (n <= anz) {
comp_15=`    ang2 = 6.28*n/anz;
comp_16=`    c = cos(ang2);
comp_17=`    s = sin(ang2);
comp_18=`    uv2.x =  uv.x*c - uv.y*s;
comp_19=`    uv2.y =  uv.x*s + uv.y*c;
comp_20=`    neu = tex2D(sampler_main, uv2 + 0.5 );
comp_21=`    ret1 = max(ret1,neu-.0);
comp_22=`n++;
comp_23=`}
comp_24=`
comp_25=`ret = ret1*2;
comp_26=`
comp_27=`}
